Articles.Content: The apoapsis is negative on the contract, and the orbit isn't rendering at all (save for a few misplaced icons).

The only thing you can do with this one is to use the debug menu to complete it, sorry.

The debug menu is accessed with alt and F12 on Windows.
A negative apoapsis means escape trajectory. The description itself doesn't sound impossible but I don't know if game can recognize escape trajectory correctly...
